title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a lightweight REST/CLI server.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node or browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; sync & async generators, pydantic models, PyPI package.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter giving ChatOllama and OllamaLLM classes with tool-calling, RAG, agents.

title: llama-index-integrations/llms/ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embedding drivers for Ollama; plug local models into RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-like web UI for Ollama (now renamed “Open WebUI”).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; Kotlin-friendly, non-blocking, Maven Central.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama; tokio, serde, streaming chat & embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for chatting, listing, pulling models; built with Python Prompt Toolkit.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for code generation, explanation, chat sidebar via Ollama.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal Next.js chatbot front-end for Ollama; one-click Vercel deploy.

title: ollama-workflows
summary: GitHub Actions collection to download/cache Ollama models and run evals in CI.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Docker-compose stacks bundling Ollama, Open WebUI, NVIDIA runtime, and RAG addons.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Experimental repo showing how to expose Python functions as tools to Ollama models.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated Modelfile collection for fine-tuned & niche models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp + qdrant in a single notebook.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Bolt-js Slack bot integrating Ollama for private or channel Q&A; serverless deploy to Railway.
